mapper.sql: id, contact_name, contact_name_cn, contact_name_en, telephone, mobile, qq, wechat, flag_available, belong_company_id, create_time, create_person, update_time, update_person,email, source_type,store_id,password,flag_major,memo,account
mapper.select: select contact.id, contact.contact_name contactName, contact.contact_name_cn contactNameCn, contact.contact_name_en contactNameEn, contact.telephone, contact.mobile, contact.account, contact.memo, contact.qq, contact.wechat, contact.flag_available flagAvailable, contact.belong_company_id belongCompanyId, contact.create_time createTime, contact.create_person createPerson, contact.update_time updateTime, contact.update_person updatePerson, contact.email, contact.source_type sourceType, contact.store_id storeId, contact.password, contact.flag_major flagMajor from dmi_contact contact where contact.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select contact.id, contact.contact_name contactName, contact.contact_name_cn contactNameCn, contact.contact_name_en contactNameEn, contact.telephone, contact.mobile, contact.account, contact.memo, contact.qq, contact.wechat, contact.flag_available flagAvailable, contact.belong_company_id belongCompanyId, contact.create_time createTime, contact.create_person createPerson, contact.update_time updateTime, contact.update_person updatePerson, contact.email, contact.source_type sourceType, contact.store_id storeId, contact.password, contact.flag_major flagMajor from dmi_contact contact where contact.belong_company_id = #{belongCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND contact.contact_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND contact.mobile LIKE CONCAT('%',#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND contact.telephone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND contact.email LIKE CONCAT('%',#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND contact.wechat LIKE CONCAT('%',#{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND contact.qq LIKE CONCAT('%',#{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and contact.flag_deleted = 0 order by contact.update_time desc

select dc.id, dc.contact_name contactName, dc.mobile, dc.telephone FROM dmi_contact dc LEFT JOIN dmi_contact_store_relation dcsr ON dcsr.flag_deleted = 0 AND dc.id = dcsr.contact_id LEFT JOIN dmi_contact_company_relation dccr ON dccr.flag_deleted = 0 AND dc.id = dccr.contact_id WHERE dc.belong_company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND dcsr.contact_id IS NULL AND dccr.contact_id IS NULL AND dc.flag_deleted =0

select dc.id, dc.contact_name contactName, dc.mobile, dc.telephone FROM dmi_contact dc
LEFT JOIN dmi_contact_store_relation dcsr ON dcsr.flag_deleted = 0 AND dc.id = dcsr.contact_id LEFT JOIN dmi_contact_company_relation dccr ON dccr.flag_deleted = 0 AND dc.id = dccr.contact_id WHERE dc.belong_company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND dcsr.contact_id IS NULL AND dccr.contact_id IS NULL AND dc.flag_deleted =0

contact_name_cn = #{contactNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_name_en = #{contactNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
select contact.store_id AS storeId, contact.belong_company_id AS companyId, contact.id AS contactId from dmi_contact WHERE 1=1
and contact_name = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
and flag_deleted = 0

select
from dmi_contact where mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flag_deleted = 0

flag_deleted = #{flagDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
flag_available = #{flagAvailable,jdbcType=BIT},
belong_company_id = #{belongCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.select:
select
from dmi_contact where account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flag_deleted = 0

SELECT ( CASE
WHEN ds.store_name IS NULL THEN ( CASE WHEN ( SELECT company_id FROM dmi_contact_company_relation WHERE contact_id = dc.id ) IS NOT NULL THEN dci.company_name END ) ELSE ds.store_name END ) AS StoreOrCompany, dci.company_name companyName, dc.contact_name contactName, dc.contact_name_cn contactNameCn, dc.contact_name_en contactNameEn, dc.telephone, dc.mobile, dc.qq, dc.wechat, dc.email, dc.memo FROM dmi_contact dc LEFT JOIN dmi_company_info dci ON dci.id = dc.belong_company_id LEFT JOIN dmi_contact_store_relation dcsr ON dcsr.contact_id = dc.id LEFT JOIN dmi_store ds ON ds.id = dcsr.store_id WHERE belong_company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND dc.flag_deleted = 0
select mobile from dmi_contact where mobile is not null and mobile !=''
select account from dmi_contact where account is not null
